website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for cutting heavier materials, with handy extras like storage for replacement blades, this sturdy knife is a star player in many toolkits.
pros: Effortlessly slices through cardboard, and handles thick material like carpet very well
Blades are easy to replace, and lock securely in place either open or closed
Extra blades store within removable cartridge in handle
cons: Knife is too large and heavy for some smaller users
Snap-away blades dull quickly when cutting stiffer materials
Locking screw can get in the way when cutting

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought stopped working, specifically I could no longer get the blade to come out of the head of the razor knife. I decided to buy a second one, and eventually the same results occurred. The matter how hard (or gently) I push, the blade won’t come out of the head. It just jams. I want to be clear that I never dropped either one of these knives, not even once. I tried loosening the screw on the head to varying degrees, until it was wide open. Still, I can’t get the knife blade out. So I have given up on this brand, and emphatically do NOT recommend it to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Kutir is the best utility knife available today
customer_reviews.text: This is the best utility knife we have ever worked with, like a giant exacto knife. It has the advantage of a full-sized handgrip, which allows for accuracy and control. The retractable and replaceable blades make sure that you are always working with the sharpest edge. We are currently using the knife to free dozens of paperback-bound books from their bindings, so we can convert the books to digital formats. With multiple passes of this Kutir utility knife, the bindings come away cleanly and safely. Love your product, and would recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Calderone

customer_reviews.title: Love this tool
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool. 1 blade loaded and ready to go. Extra blades stored below it in handle. New blades load sort of like a stapler. Feels well balanced in hand and cut is sharp. Nicest box cutter I have ever used. Ease of use and advancing snap off blades like the cheap plastic ones but durable comfortable construction. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MitzyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Can't retract blade - dangerous
customer_reviews.text: On my very first usage, I extended the blade and could not retract it. I spent an hour trying to make this thing work. After taking it apart, I found that while trying to retract the blade, the metal blade would slide against another metal part and dig in and get caught. Trying to force it to retract would cause it to dig in further. The fact that this can occur means it was designed poorly. A blade that can't retract is too unsafe to have in my house, and so I rate it 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Never Knew a Box Cutter Could Make Me This Happy
customer_reviews.text: I thought all box cutters were alike - you know, dull with a blade that won't stay put. I needed to resize some cardboard boxes for mailing, and found this through Amazon reviews. I'm so glad I bought it. The blades stay firmly in place, are super-sharp and cut through the cardboard like butter. I'm not that strong and still found it to be comfortable to hold. The project that would have been frustrating and time consuming was easy and done in a flash. In fact, I now look forward to the next project that I can use my cutter with. I've ordered another as a Christmas present for someone who was admiring it.
customer_reviews.author: Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Great cutter. Not as heavy as others have mentioned and complained about. I'm a female and thought it was the perfect weight -- more substantial than general cutters, but not heavy at all in my hand. I used it to cut lots of carpeting and it was great. The metal components are terrific-- good quality. And the tightener is solid... I had no worries it would loosen while in use. This looks like it will lady a long time. (I'm still trying to figure out what the yellow plastic thing is for... didn't fit as blade cover and appears to be for blade storage, but I thought that was in the handle itself. I need to reread the product description.)
customer_reviews.author: smylingjay

customer_reviews.title: So happy I found this!
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned anything like this. Didn't really feel the need for it. But I recently bought some furniture and larger things that made it really hard to break down the boxes for recycling. The instructions were helpful but I read them later............ :) It was very easy to see there was a safety lock and that you could move the blade up as much as you wanted. It saved me so much time to use this tool. I was also sent a link to watch a You Tube Video on how to find the extra blades which I will do. Very thoughtful added bonus. Very happy with how fast this came and how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: SJillian

customer_reviews.title: Bought to cut EVA foam for a cosplay
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the sharpest and most durable utility knives I've ever used. I bought mine to cut out EVA foam (floor mats) to make a cosplay out of, and this utility knife sliced through the foam with ease. EVA foam dulls any knife quickly, but this one kept its sharpness far longer than any of my other knives (It did eventually get dull, but I also bought the "Kershaw sharpener" to keep it sharp!) Good price for the quality of the knife as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wikiwakawakawee

customer_reviews.title: Best Box Cutter I Have Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: The lock feature alone makes this cutter 10 star. I use this knife to recycle my cardboard and always have knives fail in very little time. This one is rugged and the lock feature keeps the knife from failing by allowing all the blades to exit the knife when you least expect it. Looks like I will no longer to have 6 or 8 knives as backup, this one is the champ by far. Great buy and high value.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Kalligher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cutter !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Cutter ! It fulfill all expectations. I feel it strong and comfortable taking it in my hand. The design is professional. It's easy to use. The cutting edge of the blade is very good and cuts very well. The screw that secures the blade makes the work safer because on hard or moving surfaces the blade does not go flying. Good usability / quality / price ratio. The seller made shipping on time and the product was received on time. The packaging is good. The product was well protected. The product arrived in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: DONY

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst utility knife I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst utility knife I have ever used. Upon first use I was cutting some light cardboard, and the whole knife broke apart and all the blades fell out. I figured out how to put it back together, and tightened the lock on the blade. I've used it in this condition for almost a year, and every time I need to break down cardboard, I seem to have some issue. Now the lock does not hold the blade tight anymore and when I try to cut, the blade slides out leaving a sharp blade sticking out from the cardboard. There is no way this knife would hold up to something stronger like carpet or to score drywall.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Wangler

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes after reading reviews. I own and use several of these style utility knives. Blades do not snap cleanly, be careful if you have not tried yet. Blade feed mechanism is junk. It does not grab and feed the blades after only a few uses. Replacing the blades is problematic at best. Blade locking knob does nothing except be in the way when you are trying to cut at most angles. My $3.99 utility knives do the job as well or better without the above noted issues. I wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: sportmom

customer_reviews.title: First blade I tried to snap refused and ended up ...
customer_reviews.text: First blade I tried to snap refused and ended up flinging up into my face and broke at a weird angle. The blade dulls within a couple of uses even though I'm only using it for tape and cardboard boxes and they almost never snap clean. It's still useable but the lock and the piece that connects to the blades came undone once and it hasn't been the same since. It's alright. I'll use it until I'm out of blades but I won't be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sai

customer_reviews.title: Does not retract
customer_reviews.text: I probably have a faulty knife but this thing does not retract. Every time I slide the blade out to cut something when I retract it becomes unhooked and doesn't retract. I have fiddled with it but it still happens every time I slide a blade out and as I retract it and it doesn't work. Total waste of money and extremely irritating. Wonder why everyone else is not having the same issue?
customer_reviews.author: Robcpt

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!! ⚙️
customer_reviews.text: This Knife is exactly as described, and I love it!!!! I've used it to cut 1.5 inch rope, thick moving boxes into pieces, and area rugs. It was super and really easy to use. I like the fact it has the safety feature so when I store it I'm not worried I could accidentally cut myself. The blade is very long and sturdy. This is a keeper and one of the best on the market without question.
customer_reviews.author: UnikTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Cut thick carpet without slicing me.
customer_reviews.text: I am clumsy and generally end up slicing my hands while using a knife like this. I miraculously did not with this knife. Good grip, easy to retract safely. Took me a minute to figure out the locking mechanism, blade kept receding, but that's just my denseness, not a knife flaw. I needed to cut through a thick carpet. This knife did the trick with relative ease and again without me damaging myself.
customer_reviews.author: Paris 27

customer_reviews.title: High Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the single best utility knife I've owned. I use this knife for building cosplay armor/weapons. It's extremely sharp and made of a solid metal frame. For the price it's a fantastic purchase and will not steer you wrong. I would recommend this knife to anyone and everyone. This tool is something everyone should have in their home. Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: Josh-Wai

customer_reviews.title: Rolls Royce of Box Cutters
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the weight of this box cutter. This is definitely the best box cutter in the market. I can highly recommend this product to anyone who is willing to spend an arm and a leg for a cutter, but it will last a lifetime. Extremely sharp, very sturdy, heavy, and beautifully designed.
customer_reviews.author: Manfred

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, functions terrible
customer_reviews.text: I hate to say it but this is a terrible tool. I got out because it looked strong and a good size for my hand. But the blade function is absolutely terrible. Won't come up and advance. It shows that it holds a stack of blades but I can't get it to work. No blade breaker in the handle is a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Logan War

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and useful.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several of these type knifes. But I find lately this is the one I carry in my back pocket. I used it a lot when I painted my home this year, and I use it a lot when cutting up boxes for the garbage. My daughter also used it for a craft project that involved cutting shoe boxes. For the money you cannot go wrong with this one. If i lost or broke it, I would get another. As useful as the more famous japanese brand. Comes with a supply of blades in the handle.
customer_reviews.author: EagleRock Dude

customer_reviews.title: not strong
customer_reviews.text: I have used this knife a few times and already the metal piece at the end which holds the blade has come apart and bent out which makes the knife blade unstable. Granted I was using this to cut away caulk around a window, but I have used other razor knives for this and not had this much of a problem.I suppose this could be a defect in the one I was sent. I also find the blade a bit difficult to replace and reassemble.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo985

customer_reviews.title: Broke right away....
customer_reviews.text: I was only cutting boxes and it broke. Lock feature is bad. I shouldn’t have bought it. Not worth it. I tossed it and I’m using my old one again and it’s better than this...
customer_reviews.author: 🌴🌊🌺🍹🥥🤙🏼

customer_reviews.title: Great Utility knife
customer_reviews.text: Great Utility knife! Used this to cut some vinyl plastic sheets. Sliced really well. Great that it comes with multiple blade inside already so will last a long time. It is comfortable to hold and is quite sturdy. The lock worked for me. Only thing to note is you can definitely feel the weight of it. All in all great for normal everyday use, though I cannot comment on heavy duty usage or long-term.
customer_reviews.author: Fellow Amazon Member

customer_reviews.title: Blades don't retract
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I have a faulty knife but this thing is terrible. Every time I slide the blade out to cut something when I retract it becomes unhooked and doesn't retract. I have tried to fiddle with it but it happens almost every time I slide a blade out, I retract it and it doesn't go back in..I can do this until I have no more blades inside the box cutter. Waste of money if you ask me. Makes me wonder about all these 5 star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Meeh! It's good, it's convenient, design is great, but workmanship lacking. Where did you say it's made in?... 06/03/2020: Upgraded rating to 4 stars. The extra blades compartment works without any difficulty now. Maybe it was difficult to open, at first, due to long storage time?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best Utility Knife I've Seen!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying the cheap plastic box cutters for years. However, after a short period of time I find that I need to buy a new one all over again. This utility knife appears to be the answer. It is very well made and with five blades it may be the last one I will ever have to buy. It makes a great birthday or Christmas gift. I have already gifted one to my son-in-law. Thanks for designing the Kutir utility knife. If need be, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Barney Banush

customer_reviews.title: Great for cutting EVA foam
customer_reviews.text: I got this knife so i could start my eva-foam cosplay journey, and this thing cuts through it like butter. Will update on how well it resharpens after it starts to dull. However, the part where you push up the blade is NOT covered in rubber, so watch your grip and dont slip unless you want to ruin your thumb's nail polish :-/ The blades do do NOT slip easily which is nice, and the lock works well. Has a good weight to it and overall i am very satisfied with my purchase... so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Super Cutter!
customer_reviews.text: I really needed a good box cutter, and this one definitely has not disappointed me. I love it! It slices through with the greatest of ease and is very comfortable to hold and operate. So sorry I didn't purchase this sooner. It's made my life easier, and that I appreciate. Most definitely recommend to anyone who needs one.
customer_reviews.author: HighHopes

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing but does the job.  Sort of
customer_reviews.text: It does the job but not exactly the best mechanisms for locking the blades. Seems like a lot of wasted space and design when a simpler, high quality and utility focused based design would have ended up with a much more solid product. Looks good but leaves me wanting something more functional and less colored The lock feature sometimes doesn’t release or won’t tighten leaving me frustrated. I just want to cut something quickly and move on to the next task reliably.
customer_reviews.author: Euge

customer_reviews.title: Best box cutter I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built. Sharp blades. Knife adjustment mechanism strong and reliable. Don't use the locking feature very often, but then I don't carry it around in my pocket. I can see that would be an advantage for someone who put one in a tool pouch or pocket.
customer_reviews.author: WOTNWABBIT

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Strong, easy to hold.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this box cutter and like it. I see why the reviews are excellent. At the same time, I bought a nearly identical cutter by Clauss, which is junk. I recommend this no-name "Retractable Box Cutter Utility Knife - EASY SELF LOADING Zinc-Alloy Heavy Duty" product.
customer_reviews.author: Eben Visher

customer_reviews.title: Good, Safe B
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty awesome. I’m always amazed at how sharp these things are and really like the simply but effective locking mechanism. Just withdraw the blade, hand tighten a small screw and there is then there is no way the blade can be exposed. Its ergonomic design allows precise control and lets you get a good grip when you need it. A good, handy tool.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph W.

customer_reviews.title: Happy opening my boxes
customer_reviews.text: This box cutter is exactly what I needed, I had bought a couple of weeks before buying this one and it was so difficult, I don't have that much strength anymore. Oh but when I saw this one even before opening it I knew it was a great product, now I cut my boxes with no effort and my hands don't hurt anymore. I absolutely recommend this knife, is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This did the trick! Pulled carpet out of a 2500 sq ft house all with the use of this knife. EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built and extra blades in the handle are great.
customer_reviews.text: Overall an excellent tool. I like that extra blades have been stored in the handle. If I had to nit-pick I might wish that there was a locking mechanism that clicked into place like other utility knives, however so far the locking mechanism on this one seems to be holding the blade in place just fine. An excellent tool and well worth the slightly higher price compared to other plastic utility knives.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Ruark

customer_reviews.title: Easy and safe to use with a helpful snap off tool
customer_reviews.text: This is the best box cutter I’ve ever used. It’s a good weight, easy to use and very effective without needing a lot of pressure. I’m always concerned that my grip will make a jagged cut but this one is just right and sturdy as well. The cherry on top is the yellow blade separator which adds to safety when having to snap off a new blade. I’m very satisfied with my new tool.
customer_reviews.author: Book Maven

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and solid tool
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and solid cutter. The blades are also more robust and do not flex like other sectioned blades, but is still easy to break off. A test of the sturdiness of the blade and cutter is to extend the blade a couple of inches to cut thicker items. This cutter makes solid straight cuts. Don't waste your time with the other cheaper thinner cutters; this will be the last retractable utility knife you buy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Louie

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp knife and service.
customer_reviews.text: That is the best knife I ever had, and I have a lots. Super sharp, easy to handle. Mine had a little mistake with the screw. It came out. I asked the company if I have to do something to fix that. Same day the owner mailed me back that there is nothing I have to do, but he is sending me a new one. Wow, that is awesome service for an awesome product. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: frank hoppen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sharp!  Works excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sharp, fits in your hand nice, nice extra tool to break off the dull blades. Don't extend the blade too far out or it will come out completely. Still trying to figure out how to put it back in. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: William Haywood

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty knife. Fits the hand well. I liked the safety feature that you can't retract or extend the blade until you turn the wheel. I liked that it holds several be extra blades. Very easy to change blades. The bladder snapper it comes with works great as well.
customer_reviews.author: EricaJo

customer_reviews.title: sturdy little cutter
customer_reviews.text: This will make cutting up an area rug a breeze! The one I bought from Stanley was just junk. I do like the snap-off blade feature. Thanks for a nice product with some heft for a change.
customer_reviews.author: Joann in Mn

customer_reviews.title: This retractable knife is very good and cuts through tough or thick card board easily
customer_reviews.text: This retractable knife is very good and cuts through tough or thick card board easily. The blade slides in and out and locks inside for protection very easy also. The extra blades are inside the handle and the handle is comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Naptime

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Foam and Safety
customer_reviews.text: I use this knife for EVA foam crafting, and it is amazing. I especially like the twist lock knob because it helps put a safety when closed that my kids would have a hard time opening.
customer_reviews.author: C. Meriam

customer_reviews.title: Needs stronger blade snapper
customer_reviews.text: Cutter is ok but the blade snapper is so cheap that it broke trying to snap the blade off
customer_reviews.author: Pete and Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, performs very well, feels like it is built to last. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I had a really inexpensive plastic utility knife that finally the plastic case started cracking, so I replaced it with this one. Definitely a HUGE step up from the one that I had!!! I keep this in my kitchen drawer to open boxes and cut up cardboard before putting in the recycle bin. Looks great, performs very well, feels like it is built to last. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AdalynnTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent box cutter. I love the safety feature. The cheap plastic cutter I used to have does not compare to this heavy duty cutter.
customer_reviews.author: mdgirl

customer_reviews.title: I love the size of this knife and the idea is ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this knife and the idea is great. But it didn't quite work as well as I thought it would. The blades would fall out, the lock mechanism broke on the first day I was using it and the lock mechanism never fully worked. Maybe I just got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Acker

customer_reviews.title: Great Utility Knife
customer_reviews.text: Really nice heavy duty knife. Just what I was looking for. Great knife for cutting vinyl flooring. I have a few razor knifes that were not working for one reason or another i.e... no locking ability or flimsy. But I am happy to say this one is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin White

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy locking snap-blade knife
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy snap-off blade with positive, locking feature. Not a cheap, plastic slide lock, but a real metal screw tightens on the blade so it won't slip out if it snags. Costs a bit more, but well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: g0ldnd0g

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for what i use it for
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for what i do. The lock is nice but if you dont tighten it the blade pulls out. Also it kept jamming but after beding the retainer clips more havent had much of an issue. Still better than most others and the 5 blade clip is a lot better and just one. And the blades are cheap and found anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Terry E.

customer_reviews.title: Kutir box cutter
customer_reviews.text: Cutting flex tape. No problem easy cutting. This is a solid tool. No hesitation cutting thru. Take a chance well made to last
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: excellent utility knife.
customer_reviews.text: definitely one of the best utility knives I have owned. I must have owned over 50 in the 27 years of professional practice as designer. Heavy duty, with a good rubber grip, nice function! (only criticism would be to make the tightening knob turn clockwise to tighten) Their follow up and support was also top notch. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Peter Solomon Design

customer_reviews.title: Best knife
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife. Well made. I use it a lot, love the features, and it is a workhouse. What more can I say? Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K. Barkley

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great utility knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great utility knife. I have about a half dozen Stanley knives here, but I needed one with a blade that would extend a little farther than the Stanley so that I could cut out some forms in some eva foam that was about one and a half inches thick. This knife worked perfectly. Very well made and so easy to change the blade.
customer_reviews.author: Ron S.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until I dropped it
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until it fell out of my pocket and now the blades won't come out, looks like falling 3 feet caused the locking feature to block the blade making it totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: IAUTL

customer_reviews.title: My favorite tool
customer_reviews.text: Love the break away lengths. Stored blades. Locking design. I used this to remove my entire living room carpet and cut linoleum planks to lay. The carpet was tough on the blades but that's where the fact they have break away seams came in so handy. This is a great tool.
customer_reviews.author: JmeILMNC

customer_reviews.title: It arrived on time and in great condition, sealed in its original packaging
customer_reviews.text: I always read all the reviews before I decided to purchase any items online; this utility knife is no exception. It arrived on time and in great condition, sealed in its original packaging. After opening, I tried it out on a few boxes and it was as sharp as could be expected; no, it was much, much sharper and easier to handle than any of my other utility knives. I liked the knife so much that I purchased 10 additional blades, and I plan to purchase another one as a backup. This is truly a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Arlington B Prodigalidad

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: great feel and fit in your hand. 5 reserve blads are stored in the knife handle and easily accessible when needed. good safety features should last for years
customer_reviews.author: Papa Joe

customer_reviews.title: What a Difference...
customer_reviews.text: ...a sturdy tool makes! I'm used to plastic cased box cutters. This utility knife cut through thick cardboard like a knife through soft butter. Nothing flimsy about it!
customer_reviews.author: BeatNic

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy box knife. I always keep one in my kitchen and they seem to disappear (son and husband steal them). So far I have no complaints and it is much sturdier than ones offered at Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Sewright

customer_reviews.title: I loved this while it worked!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic device while working - but mine(after very little use) now gets stuck everytime I try to push the extend the blade. Making me reach my thumb and depress the blade manually to ever use the knife. Very annoying when you retract and detract the blade often.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Functional safe & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I don't care for the safety lock on the blade tip. It is bulky and sometimes blocks my view of the incision since I hold the knife in my left hand. The blade loading is a novel approach. It is a heavy knife compared to most.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Marquardt

customer_reviews.title: Top Product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cutter, I've been using for more than a year now. Nicely designed grip handle to easily cut boxes of different sizes. Sharp enough to cut through different box thicknesses as well. It also has position lock to hold blades from sliding while cutting. Comes with extra blades for future replacements. Top product.
customer_reviews.author: Hashem

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, well thought out utility knife. The knife has an auto lock feature that prevents the blade from moving unless the red slider is depressed. It also has a manual thumb screw at the top which locks the knife closed once it's full retracted. The blades are very sharp and it comes with 4 extra blades. The knife housing is metal and feels very solid/durable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barfield

customer_reviews.title: Solid cutter.
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than the plastic cutters. I like the lock on it and the extra blades.
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Hefty
customer_reviews.text: Its got an awesome hefty feel to it, feels quality and durable, its also great it can store several blades in the nody, I love my utility knife!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo M.

customer_reviews.title: Also works better as a box cutter
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to cut the thick rubber matt which goes under an area rug. I had tried various scissors, box cutters, and old carpet knife. This one did the job where others have failed. Also works better as a box cutter. Seems like a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Aspirant1

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this knife to cut carpet -- it works amazingly well. I like that the blade can be locked in place. I haven't had to replace a blade yet. It is comfortable in my hand and only takes one pass to slice through the carpet and pad below.
customer_reviews.author: suze

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 4 stars but the front guard to prevent blade from accidental extension is uneven. This caused the blade to get stuck and can’t be push out of the housing. Otherwise it is durable and extremely sharp.
customer_reviews.author: MajesticalMess

customer_reviews.title: Best Utility Knife Ever
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt this is the best utility knife I have ever had. My wife and I needed to get rid of an old carpet but had no luck with other tools until we got this knife. This utility knife cut through that old carpet like a hot knife through butter. We had the carpet cut up in under two minutes. If you ever need a utility knife get this one. It was extra blades and a link to a pdf and video.
customer_reviews.author: Deadhead

customer_reviews.title: Blade will not lock
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the blade because it will not lock even after screwing it. It stills slips in and out and you have to manually angle it to control so not to get hurt. I will not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian C

customer_reviews.title: Well-built, Sturdy, easy to hold and use
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy knife -- not like a lot of the "snap and go" knives you can find at Wal-Mart. Not only is the knife itself sturdy, but the blades are as well -- so much so that I bought 2 refills from the same seller, and will only buy from this seller since I know the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hightower

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong!
customer_reviews.text: This is the strongest utility knife I have ever used. Blade is thick and heavy!
customer_reviews.author: MotoRider42HC

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way you can easily change the blades. You don't have to unscrew it. Just push the button and pull out the blade and either turn it around or put in a new blade.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A

customer_reviews.title: Great Utility Knife!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great utility knife - Love it!!!! Its easy to use, with break-off blades, locking mechanism, and retractable blade. It is good looking, feels good in the hand (ergonomic), and has some heft to it - was surprised by its weight but like the weight - this is not a little plastic utility knife - it should last you for a long time!! Worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Fred A. Wertheimer

customer_reviews.title: Product is awesome. My first order had a glitch in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is awesome. My first order had a glitch in the locking mechanism and they immediately sent me out another one. With the number of boxes I have to break down weekly to fit into our recycle bin, this knife is a must. The task is actually a pleasure with a tool like this.
customer_reviews.author: GalliganiDuo

customer_reviews.title: This a is a nice handy box cutter i love the grip on it ...
customer_reviews.text: This a is a nice handy box cutter i love the grip on it and all the extra blades they give u just wish it had more instructions on how to change and take out the old blades
customer_reviews.author: lesile csillam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knife!
customer_reviews.text: This utility knife is awesome! Much better than my old cheapy knife that I had before. Love the blade lock and the extra blades are stored inside it. It does have more weight to it but that's because it is solidly built, not cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: This retractable box cutter is much better than my old box cutter
customer_reviews.text: This retractable box cutter is much better than my old box cutter. It's a little on the heavy size. I'm not sorry that I ordered it. I still made a good choice, and I am recommending it.
customer_reviews.author: unique shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works great, missing 5 extra blades
customer_reviews.text: Missing the advertised 5 sharp blades that are supposed to come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real Sharp
customer_reviews.text: It opens boxes way better than my previous blade. Although it took me a bit to figure out how to get the blade out.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty and beautifully made. Well worth the price for a tool ...
customer_reviews.text: Top quality, heavy duty and beautifully made. Well worth the price for a tool to last a lifetime. Alan
customer_reviews.author: Alan D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good Engineering
customer_reviews.text: This knife was a welcome relief from cheap plastic box cutters. It sharper and cuts faster. It feeds smoothly, holds extra blades, and doesn't rust. This is a well designed product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Justice

customer_reviews.title: It a very good product because it has a lock for the blade ...
customer_reviews.text: It a very good product because it has a lock for the blade so it doesn't come out when you cutting something. The ones with out the lock the blade most of the time comes out when you are cutting something.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Breaux

customer_reviews.title: Super heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This is a super heavy duty knife, very smooth operating and of quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: dirocco

customer_reviews.title: Good box cutter, a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice box cutter. Fairly heavy duty. I like that I can lock the blade with the knob. Only complaint is it is a bit expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: RobF15E

customer_reviews.title: but it's sharp and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So far I have only used to cut boxes/shipping tape, but it's sharp and easy to use. I will be using it to cut carpet soon. Will update if any difficulty. Have not figured out how the extra blades work, but I guess I do not need them yet.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knife - lives ups to the mearketing hype
customer_reviews.text: It's very hard to tell one knife from the next online. This one is very high quality - it feels heavy in the hand, has a very solid feeling mechanism, and the blade is extremely sharp. I have owned a lot of retractable blade knives, with only a few good ones. Kulir is the best I've owned, and I'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me; had to return
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t get the knife to work right after switching blades. After, I could no longer slide the blade in and out. Luckily, did it early so I could return.
customer_reviews.author: lccl

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth money spent.
customer_reviews.text: This knife is amazing, very, very heavy duty, but works very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Smith

customer_reviews.title: It is a great utility knife with adjustable blade length with lock
customer_reviews.text: It is a great utility knife with adjustable blade length with lock. I use it to cut through ticker material which is not possible with the regular short blade utility knifes
customer_reviews.author: knzy919

customer_reviews.title: It's real sturdy and cuts through anything
customer_reviews.text: It's real sturdy and cuts through anything. The only problem is when I'm finished is having to push the top blade in with a hard surface because it wont lock on to the red slide its supposed to. Other than that it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: ddeevvoonn

customer_reviews.title: Great Utility Knife
customer_reviews.text: Very good Utility Knife. It is heavy duty and well made. I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: tommit

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and strong and has a feeling of ...
customer_reviews.text: My hands have trouble with some things (like tools) but I found this Kutir knife was all that it was advertised. It is easy to use and strong and has a feeling of strength and usability. Thank you for a fine tool. Dana
customer_reviews.author: D. Kvarnstrom

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that would make the knife better is if there were a little bit more metal ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that would make the knife better is if there were a little bit more metal so it could be hung on my magnetic tool bar but other that a good knife
customer_reviews.author: C Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Utility Knife with extra Blades.
customer_reviews.text: Great Utility knife, I have had other type knives but not stainless steel. I like that it is sharp and will not rust, which I have had problems with. I do not want to always stray them with lubricant. Also it is loaded with out taking it apart.
customer_reviews.author: George S

customer_reviews.title: Very good box knife.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well but after a few uses as with many blades, they lose some of its sharpness are heavier products. Definitely recommend. Very comfortable to use, and comes with extra blades.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knife!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! I used the kutir Stainless Steel Retractable Utility knife to break down a large cardboard box, and it cut through the cardboard, tape and string like it was cutting butter! Easy grip for older and/or arthritic hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great utility knife for a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and sturdy materials. Love the fact that it's mostly metal, not plastic. The blade lock is great too; keeps it securely in place when not in use. Plus extra blades already loaded in the knife. Can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Biggest Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Box Cutter
customer_reviews.text: I relied on the reviews and I am very pleased with the quality of this product and the video too reference about the blades. Product was delivered on time, this is a good vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Reader

product_meta.title: KUTIR Retractable Box Cutter Utility Knife - Easy SELF Loading Zinc-Alloy Heavy Duty Carpet, Rope, Cardboard Comfortable Handle Knive, 4 Sharp Rust Proof Razor Snap Off Blades Set - Metal Safety Lock
feature_bullets: ✔ SAFETY LOCK - This Self-Loading utility knife contains a safety auto headlock to ensure your safety and control from accidents while it is not in use; it comes with 5 blades that are hidden in the chamber

✔ COMFORTABLE HANDLE - Professional grade heavy-duty construction designed to last for years. This utility knife will ensure strength, comfort and maximum productivity as it is ergonomically designed and you can operate it with one hand
✔ 5 EXTRA BLADES - The electroplated blades are extremely sharp to cut faster and safer boxes, wallpapers, carpets, cardboards and ropes easily

✔ GREAT GIFT IDEA - Our ergonomic utility knife is the perfect anniversary or birthday gift for men of all ages including dads, husbands, brothers and any other men in your life. Order this knife as a birthday gift for your man today!

✔ BUY MORE SAVE MORE - We love our customers and want them to love us too. If you buy 2 or more of our Knifes you will save (Check Below in Special Offer Section). This is wonderful gift for mens, Buy for a friend or loved one and save together.
